name: Little Bum Nappies 5 nappies*10 inserts
description:
Eco-Friendly OSFA Pocket Nappies - Keep your little angel's bum comfy at all times with 100% satisfaction guarantee. 

This is for 5 nappies + 10 inserts with waterproof PUL outer and micro fleece inner. 

*Top Retail Quality *Easy to use *Quick to wash and dry *Cheaper than disposables * More environmentally-friendly *look cuter 

@ New Design: waterproof layer, 3-layers super absorbent microfiber inserts, moisture absorption and breathe freely, more colors and patterns 
@ Top Quality: comfy layer next to baby's skin, the very best washable nappies, best seller in UK, also export to Australia and Europe. 
@ Best Price: retail shop price is above $29.99 each, we offer you a great bargain.
@ Great Service: personal, practical, and professional. Deliver every day, refund will be made if there is a manufacturing fault. We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase. 
@ Buy from us: Our nappies fit most babies from birth to potty training (approx 3.6kg-15.9kg). Our pocket nappies are made from two layers stitched together to form a pocket with openings at the front and back. 

<Available colors and patterns> 
Group 1: No1 Purple, No2 Red, No3 Sky Blue, No4 Green, No5 Yellow, No6 Light Blue, No7 Orange, No8 Ivory, No9 Rose 
Group2: No10 Tripple Hearts, No11 Pink Hearts, No12 Pink Tripple Hearts, No13 Butterfly, No14 Spotty Pink, No15 Spotty Blue, No16 hobbyhorse, No17 Leopard Line, No18 African Leopard, No19 Giraffe, No20 Tiger Line, No21 Little Camouflage, No22 Little Green, No23 Calf Brown, No24 Happy Lamb, No25 Zebra, No26 Micky Mouse, No27 Winnie the Pooh, No28 Hello Kitty 

"Please note you can choose any 3 colors from group 1 and any 2 patterns from group 2" 
<Guarantee and Returns> 
We guarantee our product against faults in manufacturing. Please let us know straight away to arrange for return of the product.
